1370: Helpriko was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Imsoete at age 19 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Imsoete, Reinardus, at age 21.
1374: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Esa, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Lenildis, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Imsoete, Mense, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Hildeburgis, at age 27.
1380: Had a son with Imsoete, Goeskin, at age 29.
1381: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Margareta, at age 30.
1387: Had a son with Imsoete, Ricward, at age 36.
1391: Lost son Ricward when Ricward was 5 years old.
1396: Lost daughter Hildeburgis when Hildeburgis was 18 years old.
1399: Lost daughter Esa when Esa was 25 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
